entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
